thread.title: VIDEO: Fearless French bulldog chases bears out of her yard
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Fearless French bulldog chases bears out of her yard

author: More Content Now staff
title: VIDEO: Fearless French bulldog chases bears out of her yard
text: By More Content Now staff New Bern Sun Journal By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 11:01 AM By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 11:01 AM After Donald Hernandez of Monrovia, California, got tired of bears breaking into his backyard and causing damage, he installed a camera so he could keep an eye on things… but he never could have guessed what his footage would capture: his 20-pound French bulldog, Jewels, fearlessly chasing off two much-larger bears who invaded her turf. "[It] blew me away," Hernandez told WSBT-TV after sharing the video. "I couldn’t believe it … she turned into a wolverine." By More Content Now staff New Bern Sun Journal By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 11:01 AM
